Title: The city and citizens of Big Rapids M.I.: Remove city laws/ordinance's the community deems unnecessary.
Overview: From not being allowed to pitch a tent up in the back yard of your home to not being allowed to put a couch on your porch Big Rapids has far to many unnecessary city laws and ordinance's that we as a community can do away with to make life for the citizens of big rapids more enjoyable and lesson the amount of foolish complaints our officers have to deal with. I truly believe this would help the community as a whole and make living here in Big Rapids much more desirable and enjoyable.
Letter Body: Remove city laws/ordinance's the community deems unnecessary.
